thread.title: Congressman Harper surprised by McCarty’s withdrawal from Speaker race
thread.title_full: Congressman Harper surprised by McCarty’s withdrawal from Speaker race

author: Frank Corder
title: Congressman Harper surprised by McCarty’s withdrawal from Speaker race
text: RELEASE: U.S. Rep. Gregg Harper (R-Miss.) offered the following statement regarding the election for Speaker of the House: "Everyone in the Republican Conference was surprised when Kevin McCarthy withdrew his name from consideration for Speaker this afternoon. I respect his decision," said Harper. "We should move forward methodically and select someone who can unite 247 Republicans in order to battle this liberal President and not each other. I am so proud to live in Mississippi where our people have common-sense and are not misled by outside groups whose purpose is to raise money." 10/8/15 Posted October 9, 2015 - 5:21 am YallPolitics.Com now uses Facebook for comments. Log into Facebook to comment here.
